posts.post_text: January 23, 2016 at 6:48 PM#2Hi BenoitChangeDest EffectChangeDest "MonEffet"Assign Form "MaForm".1  At 1Assign Form "MaForm".2  At 2etc...ChangeDest /you can also assign eg the graph 1 to several lines:Assign Form "MaForm".1  At 1 + 5 + 8a+

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: January 23, 2016 at 8:39 PM#3Salut WillyMerci de ta réponsei've already tried cd effect etc... but i was missing the .1 !What is .2 ?  assign form 9.2 at 4 doesn't work, assign form 9.1 at 4, yes.why do it simple when you can do it with complicationbien cordialement

posts.author: willybsm
posts.post_text: January 23, 2016 at 9:02 PM#4.1, .2 Représente le ou les graph présent dans ta formsi tu as bien sur qu'un graph dans ta form ce sera "MaForm".1si tu as 3 graph et que tu souhaites assigner le graph 3 alors : "MaForm".3--> Represents the graph or present in your formif you did well on a graph in your form it will be "MaForm" .1if you have 3 graph and you want to assign the graph 3 then: "MaForm" .3
